scripts.deploy:send-notification:
curl -X POST -H 'Content-type: application/json' --data "{\"text\":\"$([ -z $DEPLOYER_NAME ] && git config user.name || echo $DEPLOYER_NAME) has deployed $npm_package_name@v$npm_package_version:
https://github.com/@declapract{variable.organizationName}/$npm_package_name/tree/v$npm_package_version\"}" @declapract{variable.slackWebhookUrl}
scripts.deploy:prod: STAGE=prod npm run deploy:release && npm run deploy:send-notification
scripts.deploy: if-env STAGE=prod && npm run deploy:prod && exit 0 || if-env STAGE=dev && npm run deploy:dev && exit 0 || echo 'ðŸ›‘ invalid STAGE, must be prod or dev' && exit 1
